title: About
text:
Ambedkar Bhagat Singh Study Circle is a collective of students from IIT Kharagpur. We work inside the campus with the following objectives - 1) To initiate debates and discussion within the academic community on social, economic, political and cultural issues which affect the public at large. 2) To study and discuss the thoughts and ideas of Ambedkar, Bhagat Singh and other progressive social thinkers, reformers or revolutionaries. 3) To promote a scientific temper and outlook in the campus.
See more at : https://www.facebook.com/abssc.iitkgp

title: Activities
text:
It publishes a monthly magazine with the name 'spark. Here is the link to the all issues
On May 14th, 2018 a protest was organized by the Ambedkar Bhagat Singh Study Circle, IIT Kharagpur. The event was called Solidarity Gathering for AMU and it's main aim was to show people around the country that students from all pockets opposed the laathi charge on the students of AMU. Heres the complete documentation for the event : https://wiki.metakgp.org/w/2018-05-15_Altercation_between_protesting_students_and_security_staff
